mapper.select: SELECT a.COMM_CD as commCd , a.COMM_NM as commNm FROM MCOMMTB a WHERE LEFT(a.COMM_CD,3) = #{paramCommCd1} AND SUBSTRING(a.COMM_CD, 4,4) != '0000'

SELECT a.AGENT_CD as agentCd , a.AGENT_NM as agentNm FROM MAGENTTB a WHERE 1=1 AND a.OUT_DAY >= #{paramCloseDay }
AND ( a.AGENT_NM LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValueNm }, '%' ) OR a.AGENT_CD LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValueNm }, '%') )

SELECT a.CUST_CD as custCd , a.CUST_NM as custNm , a.CUST_BUSIN_NM as custBusinNm , a.CUST_BUSIN_NO as custBusinNo , a.CUST_OWNER as custOwner FROM MCUSTTB a WHERE 1=1 AND a.USE_YN = #{paramUseYn }
AND ( a.CUST_NM LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValueNm }, '%' ) OR a.CUST_BUSIN_NM LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValueNm }, '%') OR a.CUST_CD LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValueNm }, '%') )

SELECT e.EMP_CD as empCd , e.EMP_CD as oldEmpCd , e.EMP_NM as empNm , e.DEPT_CD as deptCd , c1.COMM_NM as deptNm , e.PSTN_CD as pstnCd , c2.COMM_NM as pstnNm , e.TITL_CD as titlCd , c3.COMM_NM as titlNm , e.BIRTHDAY as birthday , e.IN_DAY as inDay , e.OUT_DAY as outDay , e.MOBILE as mobile , e.EMAIL as email , e.EDU_LEVEL as eduLevel , e.FINAL_SCHOOL as finalSchool , e.EXPLAINS as explains , e.REG_DATE as regDate , e.REG_ID as regId , e.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate , e.UPDATE_ID as updateId , e.IMAGE_FILE_NM as imageFileNm , e.IMAGE_FILE_NM_FULL as imageFileNmFull , e.SIGN_FILE_NM as signFileNm , e.SIGN_FILE_NM_FULL as signFileNmFull FROM HEMPTB e left join MCOMMTB c1 ON c1.COMM_CD = e.DEPT_CD left join MCOMMTB c2 ON c2.COMM_CD = e.PSTN_CD left join MCOMMTB c3 ON c3.COMM_CD = e.TITL_CD WHERE 1=1
AND e.DEPT_CD = #{paramDeptCd}
AND ( e.EMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{paramSearchWord}, '%') OR e.EMP_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{paramSearchWord}, '%') )
ORDER by e.DEPT_CD asc, e.PSTN_CD asc

SELECT e.EMP_CD as empCd , e.PASSWD as passwd , e.EMP_CD as oldEmpCd , e.EMP_NM as empNm , e.DEPT_CD as deptCd , c1.COMM_NM as deptNm , e.PSTN_CD as pstnCd , c2.COMM_NM as pstnNm , e.TITL_CD as titlCd , c3.COMM_NM as titlNm , e.BIRTHDAY as birthday , e.IN_DAY as inDay , e.OUT_DAY as outDay , e.MOBILE as mobile , e.EMAIL as email , e.EDU_LEVEL as eduLevel , e.FINAL_SCHOOL as finalSchool , e.EXPLAINS as explains , e.REG_DATE as regDate , e.REG_ID as regId , e.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate , e.UPDATE_ID as updateId , e.IMAGE_FILE_NM as imageFileNm , e.IMAGE_FILE_NM_FULL as imageFileNmFull , e.SIGN_FILE_NM as signFileNm , e.SIGN_FILE_NM_FULL as signFileNmFull FROM HEMPTB e left join MCOMMTB c1 ON c1.COMM_CD = e.DEPT_CD left join MCOMMTB c2 ON c2.COMM_CD = e.PSTN_CD left join MCOMMTB c3 ON c3.COMM_CD = e.TITL_CD where 1=1 AND e.EMP_CD = #{ paramEmpCd }
SELECT count(e.EMP_CD) as ch FROM HEMPTB e where e.EMP_CD = #{ paramEmpCd }
mapper.delete: UPDATE HEMPTB SET IMAGE_FILE_NM = null , IMAGE_FILE_NM_FULL = null WHERE EMP_CD = #{empCd}
UPDATE HEMPTB SET SIGN_FILE_NM = null , SIGN_FILE_NM_FULL = null WHERE EMP_CD = #{empCd}
mapper.select: SELECT a.CUST_CD as custCd , a.CUSTS_CD as custsCd , a.CUSTS_NM as custsNm , a.USE_YN as useYn , a.EXPLAINS as explains , a.REG_DATE as regDate , a.REG_ID as regId , a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate , a.UPDATE_ID as updateId FROM MCUSTSTB as a WHERE a.CUSTS_CD = "00000000"

SELECT a.CUST_CD as custCd , a.CUSTS_CD as custsCd , a.CUSTS_NM as custsNm , a.USE_YN as useYn , a.EXPLAINS as explains , a.REG_DATE as regDate , a.REG_ID as regId , a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate , a.UPDATE_ID as updateId , 'R' as iuD FROM MCUSTSTB as a WHERE a.CUST_CD = #{paramCustCd } AND a.CUSTS_CD != "00000000"

SELECT LEFT(a.COMM_CD,3) as commCd1 , LEFT(a.COMM_CD,3) as oldCommCd1 , a.COMM_NM as commNm , count(*) - 1 as cnt , a.COMM_ETC as commEtc , a.EXPLAINS as explains , a.USE_YN as useYn , a.REG_DATE as regDate , a.REG_ID as regId , a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate , a.UPDATE_ID as updateId , 'U' as iuD FROM MCOMMTB a GROUP BY LEFT(COMM_CD, 3)

SELECT SUBSTRING(a.COMM_CD,4,4) as commCd2 , SUBSTRING(a.COMM_CD,4,4) as oldCommCd2 , a.COMM_NM as commNm , a.COMM_ETC as commEtc , a.EXPLAINS as explains , a.USE_YN as useYn , a.REG_DATE as regDate , a.REG_ID as regId , a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate , a.UPDATE_ID as updateId , 'U' as iuD FROM MCOMMTB a where LEFT(a.COMM_CD,3) = #{ paramCommCd1 } AND SUBSTRING(a.COMM_CD, 4,4) != '0000'

update.foreach:
UPDATE MCOMMTB SET COMM_CD = CONCAT(#{item.commCd1}, SUBSTRING(COMM_CD,4,4)) , UPDATE_DATE = NOW() , UPDATE_ID = #{userId}
WHERE LEFT(COMM_CD,3) = #{item.oldCommCd1} AND SUBSTRING(COMM_CD, 4,4) != '0000'

delete.foreach: DELETE FROM MCOMMTB WHERE COMM_CD = CONCAT(#{item.oldCommCd1 }, #{item.oldCommCd2})
